name: Hornby Organic Carob Peanut Butter Bar
description:
Imagine the classic pairing of creamy organic peanut butter and the subtle sweetness of honey. Now add rich carob powder that's been toasted to perfection. It's pretty clear why Hornby Organic’s Carob Peanut Butter Bar is one of its best sellers.Ingredients: rolled oats (gluten-free), peanut butter, honey, tapioca syrup, coconut, carob powder, peanuts, sea salt.Allergens: peanuts, may contain traces of sesame and tree nuts.Based on beautiful Hornby Island, BC, the team at Hornby Organic follows traditional family recipes to create tasty fuel for all your outdoor pursuits.
